io.atomix.core.value

Interface DistributedValue<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - value type
    All Superinterfaces:
    DistributedPrimitive, SyncPrimitive

    public interface DistributedValue<V>
extends SyncPrimitive
    Distributed version of java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference.

    • Field Summary
